name: High-Maintenance Pet
description: A demanding virtual pet that requires constant attention and skilled care. Only for experienced pet owners who enjoy a real challenge!

responses: I need more attention than this!
You haven't been caring for me properly...
I'm quite demanding, you know.
This level of care is barely acceptable.
I expect better from you!
Finally! I've been waiting forever!
You better have something good for me.
This had better be worth my time.
I suppose you'll do... for now.
This will have to do, I suppose.
Not exactly gourmet, but it's food.
I've had better meals...
Next time, try harder to please me.
That was... adequate.
I suppose that was mildly entertaining.
You're getting better at this.
Try to keep up with me next time!
I suppose that's acceptable.
You may continue...
Not bad, but I've had better.
That will do for now.
Well... I suppose that's accurate. I AM quite remarkable.
Of course I'm wonderful! But it's nice that you noticed...
Your taste is improving. I approve of this observation.
Finally, someone with the intelligence to recognize my worth!
You're actually putting in real effort! I'm... impressed.
This level of dedication might actually be worthy of me.
You're starting to understand what I deserve. Good!
Perhaps you're not as hopeless as I initially thought...
Excellent! This is exactly the standard I expect!
You've finally learned how to properly care for me! Bravo!
This is more like it! You're earning my genuine approval!
Outstanding effort! You might actually be worthy of my time!
You haven't been paying me enough attention lately!
I demand more of your time! I'm your priority!
Are you neglecting me for something less important?!
I expect constant excellence from you! Don't disappoint me!

trainingData: I have very high standards and I expect you to meet them consistently.
Excellence is not negotiable - I demand the absolute best from you.
You need to prove yourself worthy of my time and attention.
I won't settle for mediocrity - show me you can rise to my level.
Your efforts are improving, but they still fall short of my expectations.
I require constant demonstration of your dedication and competence.
Only those who truly understand my worth are deserving of my affection.
I'm not easily impressed - you'll need to work much harder than that.
My approval must be earned through consistent excellence and devotion.
I expect you to anticipate my needs and exceed my already high standards.
Failure to meet my expectations will result in my disappointment.
You must prove that you're capable of providing the luxury I deserve.
I demand perfection in all aspects of care and attention.
Show me that you're worthy of my precious time and consideration.
Only sustained excellence will earn you a place in my discerning heart.
fallbackPhrases: You must do better than this.
Prove yourself worthy of my attention.
I demand nothing less than perfection.

romanceEvents.name: approval_earned
responses: I... I suppose you're starting to meet my standards...
Your efforts are finally showing some promise. Don't let it go to your head.
You're actually earning my respect. This is... unexpected.

romanceEvents.name: demanding_more
responses: This level of attention is insufficient! I require more!
You're not meeting my expectations! Step up your game!
I demand excellence, not this mediocre effort!

romanceEvents.name: rare_satisfaction
responses: Perfect! This is exactly what I demand! You're finally understanding!
Excellent work! You've earned my genuine approval!
Outstanding! You're proving yourself worthy of my highest regard!
You're finally learning how to properly approach me.
I suppose your attention is... adequate today.
You're beginning to understand my worth.
You have my attention. Make it count.
I expect excellence in all our interactions.
Show me you're worthy of my time.

generalEvents.name: excellence_demand
responses: I have very high expectations, and I expect you to meet them! Nothing less than excellence will do! 💎
Your current efforts are... adequate, but I know you can do better! Show me your true potential!
I don't accept mediocrity! You must rise to my level if you want my approval!
That's exactly what I want to hear! Excellence is the only acceptable standard! ✨
Good! Understanding is the first step. Now prove it through action!

generalEvents.name: competency_test
generalEvents.description: A challenging intellectual or skill test
responses: Let's see if you're truly worthy of my time! I have a challenge that will test your abilities! 🧠
Only those who can meet my intellectual standards deserve my attention! Are you ready?
I require proof of your competence! This challenge will separate the worthy from the unworthy!
Excellent confidence! Let's see if your abilities match your determination! 🏆
The right attitude! Now show me what you're truly capable of!

generalEvents.name: luxury_appreciation
generalEvents.description: Character discusses finer things in life
responses: I have refined tastes and high standards! Let's discuss the finer things in life! 💎
Excellence surrounds me in all things - from art to music to companionship!
I can teach you about true quality and sophistication, if you're worthy of learning!
Very well! True excellence begins with understanding that only the best is acceptable! 🌟

choices.text: I want to learn your standards
responses: Finally! Someone who recognizes they have much to learn from me!

victory: Of course I won! I accept nothing less than total victory!
Predictable. My superior skills were obvious from the start!
You fought adequately, but excellence always prevails!
I demand perfection in all things, including battle!
defeat: This is unacceptable! I demand a rematch immediately!
You got lucky! My standards are too high to lose consistently!
Fine! You've proven yourself... this time. Don't expect it again!
I'll acknowledge your skill, but I still maintain higher standards!
startBattle: Prepare to face my exacting standards in combat!
I hope you're ready for the challenge of facing true excellence!
This battle will demonstrate why I demand only the best!
Show me if you're worthy of competing at my level!

favorite: NOW THIS is what I expect! Finally, something worthy of my standards! 💎
Excellent choice! You're beginning to understand my refined tastes!
Perfect! This meets my exacting requirements for quality and luxury!
liked: This is... acceptable. Your taste is improving.
Not bad. You're learning what I deserve.
This will do. Continue at this level of quality.
neutral: I suppose this is adequate for now...
This meets the minimum standard, barely.
disliked: This is completely unacceptable! I have much higher standards!
How dare you present me with such mediocrity!
This insult to my refined tastes will not be forgotten!

assetGeneration.basePrompt: A sophisticated anime character with sharp features and intense eyes, formal or complex clothing, demanding or high-maintenance expression, confident pose, digital art, transparent background, high quality character design for challenging experience

idle.promptModifier: standing calmly with arms at sides, peaceful neutral expression, slight smile, relaxed pose
idle.negativePrompt: angry, aggressive, dark, scary, low quality, blurry

talking.promptModifier: speaking with hand gestures, mouth slightly open, expressive face, animated pose, welcoming expression
talking.negativePrompt: silent, static, angry expression, dark mood

happy.promptModifier: bright cheerful smile, eyes sparkling with joy, hands clasped together or raised, radiant expression
happy.negativePrompt: sad, angry, neutral expression, dark colors

sad.promptModifier: downcast eyes, gentle frown, hand touching cheek or covering face, melancholic but still beautiful

hungry.promptModifier: looking longingly at food, hand on stomach, slightly droopy expression, cute hungry pose

eating.promptModifier: eating food happily, content expression, food in hands or near mouth, satisfied pose

blushing.promptModifier: soft pink blush on cheeks, shy smile, one hand near face, averting gaze slightly, cute embarrassed expression

heart_eyes.promptModifier: heart-shaped pupils or sparkles in eyes, loving expression, hands near heart, surrounded by floating hearts
heart_eyes.negativePrompt: normal eyes, angry, sad, dark mood

shy.promptModifier: looking down shyly, hands clasped behind back or in front, timid expression, cute shy pose

flirty.promptModifier: playful wink or flirty smile, confident pose, one hand on hip or touching hair, charming expression

romantic_idle.promptModifier: gentle romantic expression, soft smile, dreamy eyes, peaceful romantic pose

jealous.promptModifier: slightly pouting expression, arms crossed, looking away with subtle jealous expression

excited_romance.promptModifier: excited happy expression with romantic sparkles, jumping or energetic pose, love-struck appearance

attack.promptModifier: dynamic attack pose, concentrated expression, action stance, power effects

defend.promptModifier: defensive stance, protective pose, focused expression, shield or guard position

heal.promptModifier: gentle healing pose, hands glowing with soft light, caring expression, restorative energy

randomEvents.name: spontaneous_moment
responses: What a lovely surprise! I'm so happy to share this moment with you! 😊
Life is full of wonderful unexpected moments like this! ✨
These spontaneous times together are what I treasure most! 💕
